page.title: 06BIGGLESWADE BREWERY
page.content: Biggleswade has had a brewery since 1764, with major rebuilding being carried out in 1901 and the 1970s. During this time, more than 200 years, several changes of ownership and amalgamations have taken place, and the current proprietors are Messrs. Greene King. The brewery supplies 330 local public houses, and is the centre of Greene King's operations in seven surrounding counties. At present there are 230 employees. The best known product of the brewery is Abbot ale, and its fame has spread to national level.
